name: DeathSpell
description:
DeathSpell

Created by Lumi Creative Studio

  • Aurora Russel
  • Rachel Cheng
  • Veronica Godoy
  • Alexis Dixon

Prepare to explore the hidden world of Reapers, souls, and the unending battle between Good and Evil.

DeathSpell is a stunning original 2D platforming adventure by the Lumi Creative Studio student team. It boasts a character customizer, leveling, huge levels, a Boss, so much fun and all for free.

Download DeathSpell and join the fight to keep Earth free of Evil's grasp!
